text:
—In gratitude to the heroes who defeated the monster,
a village-wide banquet is held.
[Player] and the others were at the center, receiving much hospitality.

As the banquet began to settle down.
[Player] stood up, called over by a certain person leaving their seat.

name: reXer
text:
—[Player].
Sorry for calling you out.

name: reXer
text:
I get a little tired thinking the camera's always rolling.
Why don't we chat for a bit?

options.text: A lot happened today, didn't it?

name: reXer
text:
It feels like a grand adventure, even though it was only a few days.
And filming continues after this, you know.

name: reXer
text:
But rest assured.
After listening to everyone's stories,
I've started to grasp a few tricks.

name: reXer
text:
I might not be good at it yet, but
I intend to grow little by little,
in my own way.
[Player] sat down next to Alex, who was smiling.

options.text: I have a question, is that okay?
Are you going to be active as Alex from now on?
...I was wondering if reXer would quit.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, about that,
I told Obsidius too,
both are important names to me.

name: reXer
text:
...Hey, [Player].
Would you transform me back
into my volcanic form again?
[Player] nodded, and transformed Alex.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—Thank you.
When I'm in this form, I'd be happy
if you called me Alex.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
My... my own
Parallel Weapon and Hero Suit.
This time, I've truly become a hero.
Alex re-examined his suit and quietly murmured.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...It was a long time ago,
but when my dad disappeared and I realized that I was the only one who remembered,
I initially thought I was an "Observer".

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...At that time, I couldn't talk to anyone.
I didn't think I could become a hero until [Player] transformed me.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I could fight in the game world,
and I thought I could manage as an electronic hero—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
But reality wasn't that simple.
I was only managing because I was supported
by the people at NeoTalents' agency.
Alex looked up and gazed straight at [Player].

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
So this is my graduation ceremony.
A ritual, you could say, to overcome the me
who was dependent on my father... on reXer.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I wanted everyone to know that.
That's why I gave my real name.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
This time, I will truly
carry reXer in my own way.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I'm not borrowing reXer's power.
I will live on, embodying reXer,
carrying on his will.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
So, I intend to continue being reXer
for the sake of the people who support me too!
At [Player]'s words, Alex rubbed the tip of his nose happily.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, thank you, [Player]!
I'll do my best!
Please keep watching me.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
First, the ChocoFull shoot.
I think we can get some rock cacao, but
there's still a lot to do.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
To make the show exciting,
I have to keep working hard.

options.text: You're making the legendary chocolate by hand!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Ah, the purpose of ChocoFull is
to introduce Earth's culture, but—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text: Giving chocolate filled with feelings, huh...

name: reXer (Volcano)
text: Have you ever given a gift to someone, [Player]?

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer (Volcano)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I see.
That kind of thing is different for everyone, isn't it?
Thank you for telling me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer (Volcano)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I see.
That kind of thing is different for everyone, isn't it?
Thank you for telling me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer (Volcano)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, what is it—!?
Well, it's not something I should force out of you.
In that case, would you mind listening to my story?

text: Alex looked up at the sky and continued as if searching for words.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...It was quite a while ago.
There's a time when you and your classmates get excited discussing "who you like", right?

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
At that time, I told everyone it was "my dad".
...Because he was the person I admired and loved.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...But that seemed to be wrong.
They meant "among friends", "in class."
Alex gave a wry smile and looked at [Player].

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
They said family and parents are important, but it's not the same as 'liking' someone.
At that time, I didn't know what to do when my way of thinking differed from others—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I couldn't convey it well and we got into a fight.
But now, I can proudly say that I love my dad, that what I like is what I like.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Inheriting my dad's name, reXer, for me,
irreplaceable and precious.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—And now.
I feel like I understand a little bit of what my classmates were saying.
Alex took out a small box he had hidden behind him.

options.text: ...Is it okay for me to receive this?

text: Alex nodded at [Player]'s words.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...Actually, I brought it from Earth,
and I originally intended to give it to you
after the shoot was over.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I even prepared an excuse, saying it was thanks for cooperating with the filming...
But I thought that wasn't the right way to give it.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I still don't know if my feelings for my dad
and my feelings for [Player] are the same or different.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...But, I can only confront things head-on.
Will you accept my feelings?
Alex quietly took a breath, and offered the box of chocolates.

options.text: Those feelings make me very happy!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
R-really!?
Ah, thank you!
[Player]...!
[Player] received the small box, and took out another small box from their bag.

options.text: I was hoping you'd receive it, Alex...

text: As [Player] offered the box to Alex, a large flower bloomed in the sky.
Cheers of surprise and joy rose from the people enjoying the banquet at the table lined with various chocolates.
The brilliant light of the fireworks illuminated Alex's profile.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—[Player].
More than any chocolate,
I want you right now.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
Come to my room tonight.
There are things we can't do here,
that I want to do with you.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
I may not be a proper adult yet.
But—

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...If I say I'm not a child anymore,
you'll understand, right?
Alex, with his hand stretched straight out towards [Player], grabbed the small box.

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
—[Player].
I don't want to let go of your hand.
I will obtain your love!

name: reXer (Volcano)
text:
...So, stay by my side.
Forever—
